scripts.test:firefox: cd output/playwright-firefox && ls && BROWSER=firefox npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codecept.conf.js
scripts.test:webkit: cd output/playwright-webkit && BROWSER=webkit npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codecept.conf.js
scripts.test:chromium: cd output/playwright-chromium && BROWSER=chromium npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codecept.conf.js
scripts.test:voiceover:chromium: cd output/voiceover-chromium && BROWSER=chromium npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codecept.voiceover.conf.js
scripts.test:voiceover:webkit: cd output/voiceover-webkit && BROWSER=webkit npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codecept.voiceover.conf.js
scripts.test:voiceover:firefox: cd output/voiceover-firefox && BROWSER=firefox npx codeceptjs run --config ../../codecept.voiceover.conf.js
